sentences: Vana laulupidude lõvi tundis ennast lauljate keskel ülihästi.
context: The Estonian word 'lõvi' has two main meanings: 1) The animal - a large brownish-yellow big cat (Panthera leo) found mainly in African savannas and semi-deserts, known as the king of animals. 2) Figuratively - an experienced, sophisticated man who attracts attention in society and is successful with women. The word can also refer to any skilled or seasoned person, such as 'vana laulupidude lõvi' (veteran of song festivals).
